title: My Favorite Amazon Prime Day Sales 2025 (+ Tried & True Items in My Home)
description: It’s time for one of the biggest sales Amazon holds all year. I’m excited! Today I wanted to share with you my favorite deals so far, plus a few of my "tried and true" from my home that are on Prime deals!
excerpt: It’s time for one of the biggest sales Amazon holds all year. I’m excited! Today I wanted to share with you my favorite deals so far, plus a few of my "tried and true" from my home that are on Prime deals!
text: It’s time for Prime Day! (July 8-11) My Favorite Amazon Prime Day Sales 2025 Hello friends! It’s time for one of the biggest sales Amazon holds all year. I’m excited! Today I wanted to share with you my favorite deals so far, plus a few of my “tried and true” from my home that are on Prime deals! *** Click here for my favorite Prime Day deals *** Visit my Amazon Storefront How to Shop with The Inspired Room on Amazon: Browse my Amazon Storefront anytime for curated favorites and deals. Check my Prime Day Folder – I’ll keep updating it with my top finds as they go live! Use the search bar within the storefront to easily find what you’re looking for (like “basket” and it will give you folders of my finds and ideas), mood boards, and real-life photos. Not a Prime member yet? Start a free 30-day trial here to access the best deals. My Favorite Amazon Prime Deals – click here My Amazon Storefront – click here Stay in the Loop: I’ll be sharing more finds on Instagram @theinspiredroom (and saving them to a Prime Day highlight), and in my free newsletter. We’ll also keep this blog post and Amazon storefront folder updated as new sales drop. A few Items from My Home on Sale: My Bedroom Rug My Outdoor Battery Powered Lamp – see details and more photos in my blog post here My Jute Rug My Striped Neutral Rug My Small Standing Desk – I shared more about this here My Striped Blue & White Tassel Throw Blanket This kitchen wrap dispenser organizer (also similar sandwich bag organizers here) Mouse Night Light in The Tiny Cottage My Favorite Steam Mop Brass Fox Bowl Semi Flush Mount Star Light (in the entrance to the Tiny Cottage!) Cork Placemats Blue and White Pot Set Blue and White Pot Set (another one!) Under Bed Organizer Upholstery and Carpet Cleaner – see more about why I love it here Over the Door Organizer – see more of this closet and additional sources here Faux Greenery in Planters Wood Bead Light Small Gold Mirror Click here for above sources (some on sale for Prime Day) I’ll update this post with more soon as deals continue to go live! Here’s a peek at a few of our Amazon folders in our storefront (click each below): See all in My Amazon Storefront – click here My Favorite Amazon Prime Deals – click here
html:
It’s time for Prime Day! (July 8-11)

My Favorite Amazon Prime Day Sales 2025

Hello friends! It’s time for one of the biggest sales Amazon holds all year. I’m excited! Today I wanted to share with you my favorite deals so far, plus a few of my “tried and true” from my home that are on Prime deals!

*** Click here for my favorite Prime Day deals

*** Visit my Amazon Storefront

How to Shop with The Inspired Room on Amazon:

  • Browse my Amazon Storefront anytime for curated favorites and deals.
  • Check my Prime Day Folder – I’ll keep updating it with my top finds as they go live!
  • Use the search bar within the storefront to easily find what you’re looking for (like “basket” and it will give you folders of my finds and ideas), mood boards, and real-life photos.

Not a Prime member yet? Start a free 30-day trial here to access the best deals.

My Favorite Amazon Prime Deals – click here

My Amazon Storefront – click here

Stay in the Loop: I’ll be sharing more finds on Instagram @theinspiredroom (and saving them to a Prime Day highlight), and in my free newsletter.

We’ll also keep this blog post and Amazon storefront folder updated as new sales drop.

A few Items from My Home on Sale:

My Bedroom Rug

My Outdoor Battery Powered Lamp – see details and more photos in my blog post here

My Jute Rug

My Striped Neutral Rug

My Small Standing Desk – I shared more about this here

My Striped Blue & White Tassel Throw Blanket

This kitchen wrap dispenser organizer (also similar sandwich bag organizers here)

Mouse Night Light in The Tiny Cottage

My Favorite Steam Mop

Brass Fox Bowl

Semi Flush Mount Star Light (in the entrance to the Tiny Cottage!)

Cork Placemats

Blue and White Pot Set

Blue and White Pot Set (another one!)

Under Bed Organizer

Upholstery and Carpet Cleaner – see more about why I love it here

Over the Door Organizer – see more of this closet and additional sources here

Faux Greenery in Planters

Wood Bead Light

Small Gold Mirror

I’ll update this post with more soon as deals continue to go live!

Here’s a peek at a few of our Amazon folders in our storefront (click each below):

See all in My Amazon Storefront – click here

My Favorite Amazon Prime Deals – click here
